title: Stacey Abrams: The kids wore a mask so I wouldn't have to

sentence: The best shot they had of beating Brian Kemp was to get him into a runoff.? Stacey Abrams, who lost to Kemp narrowly in 2018, is running again this year and is considered the putative Democratic nominee.

title: David Perdue gets clear shot at Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp with Vernon Jones primary exit

title: Kemp signs income tax refund bill into law as Perdue blasts move as desperate attempt to get votes'

sentence: Part of DeWine's success in Trump management is undoubtedly luck, because he presided over a state that Trump won by eight points and did not face the pressure that governors such as Doug Ducey in Arizona and Brian Kemp in Georgia did when the president and his allies implored them to help overturn the election.
author: Russell Berman
title: The Last of the Establishment Republicans
